content.question: The Halfway Covenant provided for which of the following?

choices.label: The baptism of children of baptized but unconverted Puritans
The granting of suffrage to non church members
The expansion of womenâ€™s power within the Congregational church
The granting of full membership in the Congregational church to all New Englanders
The posting of banns by engaged couples

content.answer: The baptism of children of baptized but unconverted Puritans

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
